column1: # List of holidays in the United States extracted from the Jollyday api.
# Each phrase before // is an alternative name of a holiday and must be in lower case.
# The comment after // is the canonical form given by Jollyday.
# This list of canonical forms can be obtained from GenerateHolidaysApp.
st. john the baptist day                //  BAPTISTE
saint john the baptist day              //  BAPTISTE
reverend dr. martin luther king jr. day //
